summary: remake of my old dragonlovers pack with new features and updates and made less chaotic
descriptionHtml:
Requires:
***Requires*** 
-Dawnguard 
-Dragonborn 
-Skse 
-SkyUI 

[b][i][size=5]-Dragon Lovers Master File-[/size][/i][/b]
[size=3]this is a basic mod that adds [/size]
[size=3]-dragon nests [/size]
[size=3]-Earth and Sea Dragons [/size]
[size=3]-Hatching Dragon Eggs[/size]


[b][i][size=5]-Dragon lovers Growth System-[/size][/i][/b]
[size=3]experience the true power of the dragonborn [/size]

[size=3]-collect dragon souls and become a powerful being [/size]
[size=3]-hp,mp,stamina increase based on dragon souls you collect and dont spend [/size]
[size=3]-unarmed damage increases based on the number of dragon souls you collect [/size]
[size=3]-speed and strength increase the more dragon souls you collect [/size]



[size=3]**To be done** [/size]
[size=3]-shout times reduction the more dragon souls you collect [/size]
[size=3]-shouts get stronger the more dragon souls you collect [/size]
[size=3]-shouts become spells when you learn a shout and have collected a certain amount of dragon souls you will learn the shouts spell form [/size]
[size=3]-learn dragon only shouts when you gain enough souls [/size]
[size=3]-quests to aquire dragon souls if you dont want to kill dragons the first quest will give a ability that will make dragons neutral to you or ally with you[/size]


[b][i][size=5]-Dragon Lovers Sea Dragons Den-[/size][/i][/b]
[size=3]Requires [/size]
[size=3]-Dragonborn DLC [/size]


[size=3]adds a true underwater dngeon/cave with sea dragons inside as well as underwater combat powers[/size]

[size=3]near pilgrims trench you can find a treasure hunter who has a ring that when worn gives underwater combat powers and underwater near it is the dungeon/cave[/size]

[size=3]**things to add**[/size]
[size=3]-more powers and spells to underwater combat[/size]
[size=3]-make a set of underwater spells that use stamina instead of magicka[/size]


[b][i][size=5]- Dragon Lovers Dragon Npcs-[/size][/i][/b]
[size=3]Requires [/size]
[size=3]-Dragonborn DLC [/size]
[size=3]-Dawnguard DLC [/size]
[size=3]-Dragon Lovers Master File [/size]


[size=3]-adds a custom unique Female flyabe follower merchant to the game at one of the dragon shrines [/size]
[size=3]-also changes the female normal hatchling dragons to the new custom dragon[/size]



____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[size=4]-In Progess-[/size]
[size=5]-Dragon Lovers Transformations-[/size]
[size=3]-adds power to turn humanoid followers into dragon Hybrids[/size]
[size=3]-adds the ability to become a dragon[/size]
[size=3]-adds the ability to become a Sea Dragon[/size]
[size=3]-Adds the ability to become a Earth Dragon[/size]
[size=3]-adds the ability to become a Dracolich[/size]

[u]Things to Add:
-Full Modulization of the mod so each modulke does something different and dont require any of the other esps
[/u][size=3]-Marriable Dragon Followers that can transform into a humanoid race[/size]
[size=3]-Buildable Rookery at the Bonestrewn Crest where you can find an egg and hatch it then it will grow to adult and lay more eggs[/size]
[size=3]-the power to ressurect dead dragons  as allies[/size]
[size=3]-the power to ride dragons and be able to control where they are going instead of just going in circles[/size]
[size=3]-Custom Unique shouts while in Dragon Form[/size]
[size=3]-Dragon Parenthood the power to lay eggs or have an egg Laid by a female dragon[/size]
author: Elfendrago

files.name: Dragon Lovers All-in-One
files.changelogHtml:
begun work on modulized version
-transformations coming soon
-added sea dragons den an underwater dungeon with underwater attack powers
-added dragon soul growth system that makes you stronger the more dragon souls you have unspent
-Remade the master file due to a few errors in its creation
-added dragon soul merchant and female Dovahe dragon follower/mount/merchant
